1409590.name: Music Maker 2021 Premium Steam Edition
1409590.description:
Make music the easy way


Looking for the right sound for your gaming videos, or want to produce pumping trap beats or high-energy techno tracks? Music Maker 2021 Premium Steam Edition enables users to bring their ideas to life in outstanding, professional-level sound – no previous music experience required. Combine sounds and loops, play melodies with virtual instruments, record vocals and rap and drag & drop to apply effects. With the customizable user interface, you can design Music Maker exactly the way you want.

More options than ever before


Music Maker 2021 Premium Steam Edition delivers even more options for easily producing your own music and achieving amazing sound. Access a massive range of sounds and loops from all genres, plus virtual instruments, functions and effects for your songs and gaming and video soundtracks – simply select the content you want to use via the in-app Store. Music Maker 2021 Premium Steam Edition also includes the new intelligent Song Maker tool as well as high-quality effects for adding the ultimate professional touches to your tracks.

Music Maker 2021 Premium Steam Edition:


  • 3 Soundpools and 1 Soundpool Collection free
  • 3 MAGIX instruments and 2 Tiny instruments
  • Even more Soundpools, instruments & functions: The in-app Music Maker Store
  • Stay up-to-date: A lifetime of free updates
  • Multicore audio engine
  • NEW! 64-bit version
  • NEW! Redesigned core workflow
  • NEW! Song Maker
  • NEW! VST2 & VST3
  • NEW! Project Notes
  • NEW! Song parts
  • NEW! coreFX VolumeFormer
  • NEW! Orange Vocoder ME VST bridge
1409590.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 瑞典语
